case_body_condition: Not recognizable - Near complete or complete skeleton
case_circumstances: Found in a remote mountain area. The perpetrators were arrested and convicted of the murder of this young man.  His identity was unknown to the perpetrators.  He had a gun which they wanted and was found with opiates in his system. He was stabbed to death. He had a shaven head and a 5 inch pony tail on the back of his head,  The pony tail had beads and other material woven into it.  It is thought that his name might be Eric and that he was from Florida. He was accompanied by a girlfriend who had a Toyota auto with white license plates. Her name is unknown
case_head_hair: Brown, Short on both sides with a 7 to 8 inch ponytail
fingerprints: Fingerprint information is currently not available
case_clothing_on_body: Maroon Turtleneck shirt, Blue denim oversized pants and white socks
case_jewelry: White metal key chain type necklace
dental: Dental information / charting is available and entered
